ComicInfo.Title: Appetite for Destruction; The Shadow in the Sea; Potential; Rick Grimes 2000: Chapter 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
The fourth chapter of RICK GRIMES 2000! Plus, new REDNECK and EXCELLENCE stories, and the first appearance of SEA SERPENT'S HEIR!
ContentsRick Grimes 2000 Chapter 4Excellence: PotentialSea Serpent's Heir: The Shadow In the SeaRedneck: Appetite For Destruction*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Charlie Adlard | 1 | B | Cover B | Khary Randolph & Emilio Lopez | 2 | C | Cover C | Pablo Tunica | 3 | D | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover D (Black & White) | Khary Randolph | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover E (Black & White) | Pablo Tunica | 5 | F | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Cover F (Black & White) | Charlie Adlard | 6 |
